MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G62 postcode area of Glasgow. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 08.33am. Our team has managed to restore power to a number of properties in the area and are still working on the underground mains fault affecting the rest of our customers without power. We now expect all power to be back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2.30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:27pm on Wednesday, 13 January 2021
